title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Two points are earned for two correct descriptions.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe any of the following factors which led to the development of the galactic city as an urban landscape in North America:
The response correctly describes one of the following factors which led to the development of the galactic city as an urban landscape:
The response correctly describes two of the following factors which led to the development of the galactic city as an urban landscape:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Students must describe both the old CBD and the edge city to earn one point.

Two points are earned for two correct descriptions.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe any of the following ways that the spatial organization of commercial land use is different between the original CBD and an edge city:
The response correctly describes one of the following ways that the spatial organization of commercial land use is different between the original CBD and an edge city:
The response correctly describes two of the following ways that the spatial organization of commercial land use is different between the original CBD and an edge city:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe any of the following negative impacts of edge city development on the environment:
The response correctly describes one negative impact of edge city development on the environment:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Any initiative or policy can be matched with any impact. An explanation must be matched with an impact to receive one point

Two points are earned for two correct explanations with impacts.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain how the following sustainable design initiatives or smart growth policies below could address negative impacts of edge city development on the environment:
The response correctly explains one way that sustainable design initiatives or smart growth policies could address negative impacts of edge city development on the environment:
The response correctly explains two ways that sustainable design initiatives or smart growth policies could address negative impacts of edge city development on the environment:
